quote: Your social media strategy is not so much catching lightning in a bottle as it is a constant process of trial and error.
why_clipworthy: It challenges the perfection mindset and encourages experimentation.
suggested_hook: Think your social media needs to be perfect? Think again.

quote: The more you can be a unicorn, the better.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to differentiate themselves in a crowded market.
suggested_hook: Want to stand out in real estate? Be a unicorn.
